thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 4 of 278
thread.title: Joseph Edwards
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Joseph Edwards

author: Joseph Edwards
title: Joseph Edwards
text: I didn't have to leave home the first time, just fill out a few forms, supply some information, all over the internet, watch my email for updates, and did the closing at my home. very easy, now have a lower rate and will save thousands over the term of my loan.
